title: 5 Stocks Analysts Recommend Into September
text: August was a month marked by market uncertainty with Nasdaq 100 index falling almost 4%.

title: Facebook experimenting with hiding likes, report says
text: Another way to help improve users' mental health.

title: Now Facebook says it may remove Like counts
text: Facebook could soon start hiding the Like counter on News Feed posts to protect users’ from envy and dissuade them from self-censorship. Instagram is already testing this in 7 countries including Canada and Brazil, showing a post’s audience just a few names of mutual friends who’ve Liked it instead of the total number.

title: Facebook Stock Will Benefit If The Company Pays $6 Billion To Acquire Yelp
text: Per Trefis estimates, Facebook could potentially pay $5.8 billion to acquire Yelp and still accrue billions of dollars in value for its own shareholders. We detail the rationale behind Facebook potentially acquiring Yelp in an interactive dashboard, along with our estimate for the acquisition price

title: ECB official calls Facebook’s Libra ‘treacherous’
text: A high-ranking European Central Bank official on Monday outlined problems with the planned cryptocurrency Libra, the latest in a series of warnings from government officials.

title: What The Wall Street Journal Isn't Saying About FAANG Stocks' Poor Performance
text: This past week an article in The Wall Street Journal described the disappointing performance of the FAANG stocks, FAANG being an acronym for five technology stocks: Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Netflix, and Google. What did the Wall Street Journal say, and what did the Journal not say?
